Verses: 1 andriyum Irubadhumuzhaneelamum Irubadhumuzha Agalamum Paththumuzha Uyaramumaana Vengalap Palipeedaththaiyum Panninaan.

2 vengalak Kadalthottiyaiyum Vaarppiththaan; Sakkaraagaaramaana Adhinudaiya Oru Vilimbuthodangi Maruvilimbumattum Paththumuzha Agalamum, Aindhumuzha Uyaramum, Sutralavu Muppadhumuzha Noolalavumaayirundhadhu.

3 adhin Keezhppuramaai Rishabangalin Uruvangal Ovvoru Muzhaththirkup Paththu Uruvamaaga Andhak Kadalthottiyin Sakkaraththil Irundhadhu; Thottiyodu Ondraai Vaarkkappatta Andha Rishabangalin Irandu Varisaigal Irundhadhu.

4 adhu Pannirandu Rishabangalinmel Nindradhu; Ivaigalil Moondru Vadakkeyum, Moondru Merkeyum, Moondru Therkeyum, Moondru Kizhakkeyum Nokkiyirundhadhu; Kadalthotti Avaigalinmel Uyara Irundhadhu; Avaigalin Pinpakkamellaam Utpuramaai Irundhadhu.
5 adhin Kanam Naalu Virarkadaiyum, Adhin Vilimbu Paanapaaththiraththin Vilimbupolum, Leelipushpampolum Irundhadhu; Adhu Moovaayirankudam Thanneer Pidikkaththakkadhaayirundhadhu.

6 kazhuvugiradharkup Paththuk Kopparaigalaiyum Undaakki, Aindhai Valadhupuraththilum, Aindhai Idadhupuraththilum Vaiththaan; Sarvaanga Thaganamaagiravaigalai Avaigalil Kazhuvuvaargal; Kadalthottiyo Aasaariyargal Thangalai Suththampannikkollugiradharku Irundhadhu.
7 paththup Pon Vilakkuththandugalaiyum, Avaigaludaiya Pramaanaththinpadi Seyviththu, Avaigalai Dhevaalayaththil Valadhupuraththile Aindhum Idadhupuraththile Aindhumaaga Vaiththaan.
8 paththu Mejaigalaiyum Seydhu, Avaigalai Dhevaalayaththil Valadhupuraththile Aindhum Idadhupuraththile Aindhumaaga Vaiththu, Nooru Pon Kalangalaiyum Panninaan.
9 melum Aasaariyarin Praagaaraththaiyum, Periya Praagaaraththaiyum, Praagaaraththin Vaasalgalaiyum Undaakki, Avaigalin Kadhavugalai Vengalaththaal Moodinaan.
10 kadalthottiyai Keezhththisaiyaana Valadhupuraththile Therkumugamaaga Vaiththaan.

11 eeraam Seppuchchattigalaiyum, Saambal Edukkira Karandigalaiyum, Kalangalaiyum Seydhaan; Ivvidhamaai Eeraam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkaaga Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Seyyavendiyavelaiyai Seydhumudiththaan.

12 avaigal Ennavenil, Iranduthoongalum, Irandu Thoongaludaiya Munaiyinmelirukkira Kumbangalum, Kumizhgalum, Thoongaludaiya Munaiyin Melirukkira Kumizhgalaana Irandu Kumbangalai Moodugiradharku Irandu Valaippinnalgalum,
13 thoongalinmelulla Kumizhgalaana Irandu Kumbangalai Moodugiradharku, Ovvoru Valaippinnalin Irandu Varisai Maadhalampazhangalaaga, Irandu Valaippinnalilumirukkira Naanooru Maadhalampazhangalume.
14 aadhaarangalaiyum, Aadhaarangalinmelirukkum Kopparaigalaiyum,
15 oru Kadalthottiyaiyum, Adhinkeezhirukkum Pannirandu Rishabangalaiyum,

16 seppuchchattigalaiyum, Saambal Karandigalaiyum, Multhuradugal Mudhalaana Panimuttugalaiyum, Eeraamabi Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukkuk Karththarinaalayaththirkaaga Suththamaana Vengalaththaal Panninaan.
17 yordhaanukkaduththa Samanaana Boomiyil Sukkoththirkum Sareththaavukkum Naduve Kaliman Tharaiyile Raajaa Avaigalai Vaarppiththaan.
18 indhap Panimuttugalaiyellaam Saalomon Vegu Eraalamaai Undupanninaan; Vengalaththin Nirai Thogaikku Adangaadhadhaayirundhadhu.
19 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Vendiya Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum; Porpeedaththaiyum, Samugaththappangalaiyum Vaikkum Mejaigalaiyum,
20 muraiyinpadiye Sannidhikku Munbaaga Vilakkuk Koluththugiradharkup Pasumpon Vilakkuththandugalaiyum, Avaigalin Vilakkugalaiyum,
21 suththa Thangaththinaal Seydha Pookkalaiyum, Vilakkugalaiyum, Kaththarigalaiyum,

22 pasumpon Kaththigalaiyum, Kalangalaiyum, Kalayangalaiyum, Thoobakalasangalaiyum Saalomon Panninaan; Magaa Parisuththa Sthalaththin Utkadhavugalum, Aalayamaagiya Veettin Kadhavugalum, Aalayaththin Vaasal Kadhavugalum Ellaam Ponnaayirundhadhu.
